EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners / Will Irwin (1355423152.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners / Will Irwin (1355423152.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Will, I just sent you the link to complete the MBO enrollment, it will come in a separate email from our system. At the end, an I-9 will populate; you will sign/date section 1 and a local notary will sign/date section 2 ( there will be instructions on how to complete this form in your enrollment documents as well.) You can send this back to me via email (I don’t need a hard copy.) If you use a US passport as a supporting document, I will also need you to send me a copy it (you can just take a picture with your phone and email that to me.) Please feel free to reach out to me with any questions. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: wyirwin@aol.com [mailto:wyirwin@aol.com] Sent: Thursday, December 13, 2012 11:36 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners / Will Irwin Sara, So, how do I go about formally joining MBO Partners? Will -----Original Message----- From: Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> To: wyirwin <wyirwin@aol.com <mailto:wyirwin@aol.com>> Sent: Sat, Dec 8, 2012 3:47 pm Subject: MBO Partners / Will IrwinHello Will,I wanted to touch base as a courtesy and see how the contract search is going.We have a number of consultant resources that we continually update that you may find helpful. You may find them here: http://www.mbopartners.com/resources <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC01MzUmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTUzNSZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzNTE4MjAxNjgmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjUxMDkxMjcmZW1haWxpZD13eWlyd2luQGFvbC5jb20mdXNlcmlkPWwtMTI4LTI2MjA5LTk5ODI5LTEmZXh0cmE9JiYm&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/resources?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsXx4uQvULHr08Yy0EZ5VunJEUWy2YEDS9QhcOuuEwcWGog8zQ5X>. In addition, if you have any suggestions for new resources that might help other consultants - please let us know!Any update would be great, look forward to hearing from you.Regards,Sara___________________________________Sara Conde Consultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: (703) 793-6028f: 703-793-6070e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC01MzUmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTUzNSZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzNTE4MjAxNjgmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjUxMDkxMjcmZW1haWxpZD13eWlyd2luQGFvbC5jb20mdXNlcmlkPWwtMTI4LTI2MjA5LTk5ODI5LTEmZXh0cmE9JiYm&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsXx4uQvULHr08Yy0EZ5VunJEUWy2YEDS9QhcOuuEwcWGog8zQ5X>
